festival.introText:
Climax Live are bringing Escape back to Swansea, expect everything you knew and loved about the event and so much more!

Climax Live are Wales’ largest festival company and long-standing operators of the Inside Out Festival in Cardiff and both the Colour Clash and Party at the Park Festivals in Tredegar Park, Newport.

You can also expect a world class line up, keeping to the Escape sounds with some of the biggest names to ever grace the dance music scene. But we’re taking things to the next level with the addition of some of the biggest current names in House, Trance, Drum & Bass and more. We promise the biggest dance music line up Swansea has ever seen.
festival.descriptionText: Skiddle is an official ticket outlet of Escape 2023. Get Escape Festival tickets, news and information with Skiddle.com.

reviews.title: Review of Escape 2022
reviews.body: Great music, great people. Just way to pricey. I guess something has to pay for their holiday tho

reviews.title: Review of Escape 2022
reviews.body: Escape was actually a mental day, best rave Im been to in a long time. Highly recommend

reviews.title: Review of Escape 2022
reviews.body: The whole set up was absolutely awful!!  I have been going to escape in the park since the first one 25 years ago and it was incredible compared to this years was dreadful?? Everything squashed together? Music outside sounded distorted. Spread it out more

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Escape 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body: Escape was actually a mental day, best rave Im been to in a long time. Highly recommend

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Escape 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body: I'm 62 years old , ive been to many escapes before but this one was by far the best .Ben Nicky is by far the best dj going

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Escape 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body: what a f**king stormer!!!! Absolutely slamming, Ben Nicky,Eddie Halliwell,Judge Jules and Billy Gillies Absolutely blew the f**king roof off! Unreal festival can't wait for next year.

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Escape 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body: The toilets were on a bit of a slant this year, felt like I was falling off the toilet. Music was great, love the venue, see you next year, over & out

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Escape 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body: fab evening only issues were queuing in the VIP and the security were letting other through..  Apart from that absolutely amazing again..

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Escape 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body: other amazing time at Escape can't wait for next year
